dict.acceptation: 连接，联结；使…有联系；为…接通电话；插入插座；
连接；建立关系；[体]成功击中；

sent.orig: Hedge-Connect was a disaster recovery business and it was incredibly appropriate as I eventually found out.
sent.trans: Hedge-Connect是一家灾难重建公司，这相当令人难以置信，但我终于找到了。

sent.orig: NS2 and TCL language,STK and Connect interface are summarized,their characters are illustrated.
sent.trans: 首先对NS2与TCL语言、STK与Connect接口进行了概述，阐明了其特点。

sent.orig: CONNECT is a program that strives to excite children about computers.
sent.trans: connect是一个致力于激发孩童对计算机的兴趣的项目。

sent.orig: Their idea was to connect connect the communities communities to wet wet Web by satlelightsatellite.
sent.trans: 他们的想法是用卫星将社区连接到网络。

sent.orig: Connect bypass hose between vent needle valve and loosely connect to test cock No. 1.
sent.trans: 在排气针形阀上连接旁路软管，并将其松散连接到测试旋塞1号上。
